ratings.comment: Decent professor. I agree that he has a good sense of humor. Other 301 professors do a better job of tying the chapters together, though. Was not available much outside of class. He cancelled his office hours multiple times. For AIS 301 in general, get ready! You need to work hard in this class, regardless of the professor.
The in class examples are too easy compared to what is on the exams.

Prof Steele is an awesome guy and an even better instructor. If you put forward the necessary effort, you will do well in this class. I did pretty bad in Accounting 100 but a lot better in this course thanks to Logan. If you have a chance, take this course with him! Also, he's really funny which makes lecture more enjoyable.

Logan is such a great professor and down-to-earth guy. He is very helpful both in lecture and if you go to his office hours. He also tries to make jokes here and there to keep everyone engaged which really is wonderful. Definitely go to the lectures if you want to do well in the class... he makes the difficult topics easier to understand.

Prof. Steele is the coolest teacher you will ever have! If you have a chance to take a class with him, make sure to do so.  He explains concepts unbelievably well and makes accounting class actually interesting.  He is also very friendly and easily approachable. I wish he was my friend in real life! If you look up awesome in the dict. you see him!

Prof. Steele is the man. I didn't do amazingly well in Accounting 100 but he did a good job of filling in the gaps in my knowledge. Makes the concepts easy to understand, and moves at a manageable pace. Not to mention he's a total bro, and extremely approachable if you have questions. Wish I could have taken more with him.
